I know i have seen a video where someone made a mod wich Draws your current flight path realtime ingame while flying.

Cant find it anymore, any idea ?

You might be thinking of Trajectories [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104694](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104694) Or maybe Transfer Window Planner [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/93115-1-0-x-Transfer-Window-Planner-v1-3-0-1-%28May-5%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/93115-1-0-x-Transfer-Window-Planner-v1-3-0-1-%28May-5%29)
Yeah I think Trajectories, with the "Body Fixed Mode," is what you want.

By the sounds of it you saw

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/jrUpbGvXrnQ?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
